acceptOwnership().details: Only callable by the current nominee. Sets nominee back to zero address.

claim().details: Only claimable when not paused.Claimable amount will be 0 if the vested amount is less than the total claimed amount. This is possible if the recipient's allocation was adjusted to be lower.

returns._0: Total amount of tokens allocated to all recipients
Unix timestamp for when the vesting ends
Unix timestamp for when the vesting starts
Whether the contract is currently paused

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

claim().notice: Transfers vested amount of tokens to the caller.
